price: Kuma wannan rãyuwa ta dũniya ba ta zamo ba, fãce abar shagala da wãsã kuma lalle Lãhira tabbas, ita ce rãyuwa, dã sun kasance sunã sani.
arabic: وَمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا لَهۡوٞ وَلَعِبٞۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ لَهِيَ ٱلۡحَيَوَانُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā hādhihi al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā illā lahwun walaʿibun wa-inna al-dāra al-ākhirata lahiya al-ḥayawānu law kānū yaʿlamūna
